transcript: You know, they didn't ask a question, they didn't take a vote, they didn't have an invitation or a map, they just started swimming as one.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You know, they didn't ask it a question. They didn't, they didn't take a vote. They didn't have an invitation or a map; they just started swimming as one.
